ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mrcfval.f | |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mrccl | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( F ` U ) e. C ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_mrcid | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) e. C ) -> ( F ` ( F ` U ) ) = ( F ` U ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( F ` ( F ` U ) ) = ( F ` U ) ) |
